p: In order to purify the nanoparticles prepared as described in section above, we followed the procedure suggested by Chaudhary et al. [ 37] The synthesized AgNPs were kept in 12 N hydrochloric acid solution for 24 h. The Ag NPs were isolated by the process of centrifugation from the mixture. The mixture was washed with distilled water till hydrochloric acid was completely removed.
